author: Chris Roche
content: ADVENTURE sails rather more than the Jubilee Sailing Trust ship TENACIOUS which recently motor sailed out of Auckland bound for Cape Horn and then did much the same to South Georgia and on to Cape Town, I am guessing that the boys ship carried no diesel, well done lads.

author: Irwin Bryan
content: Wow. It’s the Blog that keeps on giving! A great story every time!

author: RH
content: Do you have a link to the GPS tracking map?

author: Peter Wright
content: Awesome. What inspiration for those kids and so many others?
